experiences.title: Web Developer
experiences.subtitle: Consumer Choices
workDescription: Collaborated with the development team on a daily basis to implement enhancements for overall functionality across the company's managed websites. This involved communication through Microsoft Teams, GitHub, and Jira.

Took part in developing custom WordPress wizard plugins aimed at enhancing the frontend user experience and introducing additional lead information features, and also the improvement of cookie functionality.
Boosted the loading speed of the company's websites by meticulously addressing each suggestion from Google PageSpeed Insights, working on the render-blocking, minifying the CSS, JS and a lot more.

experiences.title: Web Developer
experiences.subtitle: Cowebplus System Solutions
workDescription: Led the development and customization of WordPress themes for small-scale businesses.
Conducted client meetings to gather project requirements and translated them into system specifications.
Collaborated with content writers and graphic designers to create SEO-optimized, visually appealing websites.
Managed website maintenance, including speed optimization, performance checks, and regular updates.
Designed and developed WooCommerce websites and implemented secure payment systems.
Led a team of developers and designers, ensuring project progress and timely delivery.
Managed financial responsibilities, including staff payments and fund disbursement.

experiences.title: Junior Software Developer
experiences.subtitle: Rielladirect Limited
workDescription: Provided IT support and managed front-end and back-end development for the company's websites.
Uploaded products, added SKUs, and managed variable pricing on the OpenCart shopfront website.
Managed the foodcourt subdomain, facilitating online ordering and enhancing user experience.
Administered the backend, including user management, order processing, and database maintenance.
Developed and executed strategies for website performance optimization, resulting in faster load times and improved user engagement.
